knimeNode.name: openBIS Data Set Registration
knimeNode.shortDescription: Register a bunch of files as a data set on an openBIS instance

fullDescription.intro:
The URI input port specifies the locations of the files to be registered. The owner of the freshly registered data set is specified by a variable.
For more details see openBIS KNIME Nodes.

ports.inPort: URI of the files to be registered.
